acceptance-test-run.title: To Validate the Set Master Circuit on Fibers
acceptance-test-run.name: To Validate the Set Master Circuit on Fibers

user-story.name: To Validate the Smoke Tests for SDK Application

tag.name: To Validate the Smoke Tests for SDK Application

test-step.description: When I Enter the PLEC13144915 for the Entity
Then I validate the Title of the Entity Selected
Given I validate the Jobs Tab
Then I Search for the Master Circuit in the Search Box and select the job
Then I navigate to Trace tab and select one of the trace
And I Click on the Master Circuit Button
Then I Validate the Master Circuit Panel and Create a Master Circuit
